Html:
Hi,

I need to rename an update. Do I have to decline/delete and recreate the update or can I choose to revise and then rename the update ?

(is there a user manual for WPP somewhere ?)

Thnak you.

Chris

Hi, you can revise the update and rename the "Title" field.
you can, also change the "Vendor Name" and "Product Name" but this will generate a new folder in the update tree.
